mapper.insert: insert into t_auto_test (ID, test_case_name, test_case_desc, job_name, loop_num,sort create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testCaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testCaseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{loopNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_auto_test set test_case_name = #{testCaseName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_case_desc = #{testCaseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loop_num = #{loopNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from t_auto_test
test_case_desc like '%' || #{testCaseDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
select * from t_auto_test where test_case_name = #{testCaseName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from t_auto_test where job_name = #{jobName} order by sort
